title: Found: The Perfect Summer Sandal for Walking All Day Long
description: Stylish enough for dinner, comfy enough for errands—what more could you want?
excerpt: Stylish enough for dinner, comfy enough for errands—what more could you want?
text: At the start of the year, I vowed to enhance my summer style. Yes, I’ve had this goal for the past three years...but this time, I’m committed. I’ve always preferred fall and winter fashion wares, but—as a proud Cancer—I could put a bit more effort into my wardrobe for the warmer months. Nearly halfway into 2025, I’ve made good progress, leaning into versatile maxi skirts, summer dresses, and chic linen pants. Yet, one staple was missing: cute summer sandals.Tory Burch Kira Sport SandalHistorically, sandals have been hit or miss for me. I’ve owned everything, from the noisy pair that lets everyone know I’m entering a room to those that manage to be too narrow, too flat, or simply uncomfortable. So, for this season, I created a bulleted checklist of my footwear needs. First and foremost, support is key. I move around a lot as a commuter in New York City, so secure shoes are necessary. Second, at 5’3”, I want a bit of a lift—and thankfully, platform sandals are having a moment right now. Third (and finally), I wasn’t going to sacrifice style for either of these, which begged the question: Does the perfect summer sandal exist? Well, that’s what I’m here to discuss.My investigation began at Tory Burch—I’ve purchased several sneakers from the brand and have yet to be disappointed. It felt natural to wander into another category, and my search didn’t take long.Immediately, the stylish Kira Sport Sandal caught my eye. I couldn’t get over how stunning the gold hardware looked against the leather. It comes in multiple colorways, but I chose the black one, and in the short time I’ve had the style, it’s already become a staple shoe. The molded footbed makes me feel like I’m walking on clouds. Coming from a label like Tory Burch, this sandal is peak luxury and offers the right amount of height to stay away from the sticky New York summer streets. Plus, the versatility of the sandals means I’ll look chic at the office and during dinner with friends—and you will, too.To put it simply, this chunky, strappy shoe is the perfect summer sandal. You’ll have to try it out yourself, but I guarantee the compliments will be rolling in. (Need proof? A handful of my coworkers have been ogling them every time I wear them to the office.) If you’re looking for options to go with all of your summer looks, browse all the styles from Tory Burch below.Tory Burch Kira Sport SandalTory Burch Kira Sport SandalTory Burch Kira Sport SandalNow 37% OffTory Burch Kira Sport SandalTory Burch Kira Sport SandalNow 50% OffTory Burch Kira Sport SandalNow 35% OffTory Burch Kira Sport SandalNow 33% OffTory Burch Kira Sport SandalNow 66% OffTory Burch Kira Sport SandalTory Burch Kira Sport SandalNow 46% OffTory Burch Kira Sport SandalNow 37% OffTory Burch Kira Sport SandalNow 55% OffTory Burch Kira Sport SandalNow 37% OffTory Burch Kira Sport SandalNow 49% OffTory Burch Kira Sport SandalNow 30% Off
html:
At the start of the year, I vowed to enhance my summer style. Yes, I’ve had this goal for the past three years...but this time, I’m committed. I’ve always preferred fall and winter fashion wares, but—as a proud Cancer—I could put a bit more effort into my wardrobe for the warmer months. Nearly halfway into 2025, I’ve made good progress, leaning into versatile maxi skirts, summer dresses, and chic linen pants. Yet, one staple was missing: cute summer sandals.

Tory Burch Kira Sport Sandal

Historically, sandals have been hit or miss for me. I’ve owned everything, from the noisy pair that lets everyone know I’m entering a room to those that manage to be too narrow, too flat, or simply uncomfortable. So, for this season, I created a bulleted checklist of my footwear needs. First and foremost, support is key. I move around a lot as a commuter in New York City, so secure shoes are necessary. Second, at 5’3”, I want a bit of a lift—and thankfully, platform sandals are having a moment right now. Third (and finally), I wasn’t going to sacrifice style for either of these, which begged the question: Does the perfect summer sandal exist? Well, that’s what I’m here to discuss.

My investigation began at Tory Burch—I’ve purchased several sneakers from the brand and have yet to be disappointed. It felt natural to wander into another category, and my search didn’t take long.

Immediately, the stylish Kira Sport Sandal caught my eye. I couldn’t get over how stunning the gold hardware looked against the leather. It comes in multiple colorways, but I chose the black one, and in the short time I’ve had the style, it’s already become a staple shoe. The molded footbed makes me feel like I’m walking on clouds. Coming from a label like Tory Burch, this sandal is peak luxury and offers the right amount of height to stay away from the sticky New York summer streets. Plus, the versatility of the sandals means I’ll look chic at the office and during dinner with friends—and you will, too.

To put it simply, this chunky, strappy shoe is the perfect summer sandal. You’ll have to try it out yourself, but I guarantee the compliments will be rolling in. (Need proof? A handful of my coworkers have been ogling them every time I wear them to the office.) If you’re looking for options to go with all of your summer looks, browse all the styles from Tory Burch below.
